comments.body: I just saw the developer has commented earlier that this `rm` line is not needed anymore. Do you want to try removing it? I am ok merging the PR regardless.

It still vendors quite a few fonts.

We would have to make sure that all those licenses are valid.

I think for now, it is best to simply avoid the fonts folder due to licensing confusion

![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/90008/71549386-6716e200-298a-11ea-9547-0461d028445f.png)

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +14,18 @@  number: 0
  script:
    - rm -rf proplot/fonts
    - "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"
